page_content:
55United Way of 
Fort Smith Area
ArcBest has been a Pacesetter company for the United Way of Fort Smith Area 
for decades and participates in many initiatives including Fill the Bus and Day of Caring. Through multiple fundraising efforts, employee pledges and a company match, we raised nearly $410,000 in 2019. 100% of our contributions go directly to partner agencies that invest in programs that provide education, childcare, shelter and food. Here are some fun events our employees hosted to raise money:
